name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
author: Dole
summary: Hot, grilled shrimp are dressed with a sauce made from Taco Ranch Dressing, and served on warmed flour tortillas.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
6 (8 inch) flour tortillas, heated according to package directions
1 (12 ounce) package DOLE® All Natural Southwest Salad Kit
directions: Combine olive oil, lime juice, peel, and cumin in small bowl
Thread shrimp onto skewers; season with salt and pepper
Grill until shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes per side, brushing occasionally with lime mixture
Combine taco ranch dressing, sour cream and shredded cheese included in the kit
Spread mixture over each tortilla; top with shrimp, salad greens and chips
Serve with favorite toppings, such as diced tomatoes, salsa, sliced olives and/or guacamole
